abstract: Editorial expresses support for revised system that Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services has put in place for rating nursing homes; notes that new system will, among other changes, implement on-site surveys and require all nursing homes to report staffing levels, an important determinant of their quality.
lead_paragraph: Under a revised system, consumers will be able to get more accurate ratings.

headline.main: Is That Really a Five-Star Nursing Home?
headline.print_headline: Is That Really a Five-Star Nursing Home?

snippet: Under a revised system, consumers will be able to get more accurate ratings.

keywords.value: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
keywords.name: organizations
